funcs.name: hphp_is_service_thread
funcs.desc: Returns an indication of whether the current thread is a service thread or not.

return.desc: TRUE if the current thread is a service thread, FALSE otherwise.

funcs.name: hphp_service_thread_started
funcs.desc: A function to call to tell system a service thread has completed its startup.

funcs.name: hphp_service_thread_stopped
funcs.desc: A function to call to ask system whether a service thread should stop.

return.desc: TRUE if HTTP server is stopping and service thread should stop, FALSE otherwise.

args.name: timeout
args.desc: How many seconds to wait for system to tell us.

funcs.name: hphp_thread_is_warmup_enabled
funcs.desc: Whether current thread is warmed up with some PHP document.

return.desc: TRUE if warmed up already, FALSE otherwise.

funcs.name: hphp_gettid
funcs.desc: Gets the kernel thread id of the current running thread.

return.desc: The tid of the current running thread. In Linux, this is gettid()
